nodes.text: Garcornian spice was a rare spice variant mined in the Garcornia system. It was considered to be contraband, and ten kilograms of Garcornian spice were smuggled aboard the luxury liner Alamintari inside a T-P-C4 Live Organism Comfort Conveyor. The case also contained a sound chip playing the prerecorded sounds of a Breshig trill beast to deter people from looking inside. However, Customs Inspectors performed a spot check on the case and found the spice.
